Package RDFCalendar :: Module Store

Module RDFCalendar.Store

Storage of nodes according to RDFCalendar conventions.

Classes
DebugStore A class displaying store operations.
FreeBusyRequest A record of free/busy request information.
Store A wrapper around a data store, providing convenient access for parsers and writers.

Function Summary
  open(store_name, store_type, context, **kw)
Open the store with the given 'store_name' of the given 'store_type', providing an optional 'context' where supported.

Function Details

open(store_name, store_type, context=None, **kw) 

Open the store with the given 'store_name' of the given 'store_type',
providing an optional 'context' where supported.
